metadata.name: Shoot-Down #1
metadata.description:
This work reveals the essence of human nature that pushes one to doubt everything when the world becomes a mysterious place where things are actually unforeseeable and dangerous in nature. The artist offers an intrinsic look into the world where one is thrown into force majeure such as natural disasters, social unrest, violence. 

#NFTart  #war  #teddy bear  #physical-based   #animated
